channel.title: Comments on: HTML5 Support for the Visual Studio 2010 Editor available for download
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: amelia @ IT Management
item.dc:creator: amelia @ IT Management
item.description: I'm extremely excited about this. At last, HTML5 is supported. Now we don't have to rely so much on Flash with simple rich-media content.
item.content:encoded: I’m extremely excited about this. At last, HTML5 is supported. Now we don’t have to rely so much on Flash with simple rich-media content.
